channel.title: SOEN7481 - Software Verification and Testing on Tse-Hsun (Peter) Chen's website
channel.description: Recent content in SOEN7481 - Software Verification and Testing on Tse-Hsun (Peter) Chen's website

item.title: SOEN7481 Fall 2018
item.description: Week1 : Course Overview (Sept4) Intro to Testing and Verification Week2 : Course Overview (Sept11) Assignment Assignment-related paper: Simple testing Assignment-related paper: FindBugs Slides on static analysis and simple testing Slides on DBChecker Week3 : Bug Detection (Sept18) PR-Miner: automatically extracting implicit programming rules and detecting violations in large software code Tricorder: Building a Program Analysis Ecosystem Why don’t software developers use static analysis tools to find bugs Week4 : Quality Assurance in Continuous Integration (Sept25) An Empirical Analysis of Flaky Tests What Causes My Test Alarm?
